How It Works
Sunday: Weekly planning PR is created with farmers market vegetable suggestions. Edit the vegetables on GitHub, then merge the PR when ready.
Auto-Generate: When you merge the PR, the meal plan is automatically generated based on your constraints and appears on this site.
Daily: At 8pm PST, a GitHub issue is created for daily check-in. Log your meals from your phone or web browser.
Learning: The system tracks your freezer backups, updates inventory, and learns from your daily logs to improve future suggestions.

For more details, visit the GitHub repository.
